name: Raghab Chatterjee
description: '''Raghab Chattopadhyay''', also spelled as '''Raghav Chatterjee''' is an [[Indian Bengali]] singer. He mainly sings Bengali modern songs, [[Rabindra Sangeet]] and [[Nazrul Geeti]]. He has also worked as a playback singer in various [[Bengali language|Bengali]] and [[Hindi language|Hindi]] films. He was a judge of ''[[Sa Re Ga Ma Pa Bangla|Sa Re Ga Ma Pa Bangla 2024]]''.
